name: Twister - Best Ride Simulators
description:
Best Ride Simulators. The best simulators of attractions with graphics and more realistic animations.

Best Ride Simulators focuses on the quality of its simulators, trying to be as true to reality, with as many details as possible, more realistic sounds and better animations. All this together with HD graphics on mobile and tablets !.

You can know what it feels like to handle your own attraction for yourself, being able to control every engine and every effect of the attraction.

All the controls of the application are simple and clear to be able to handle everything in an easy and fast way.

All simulators are tested on mobile phones of all kinds of benefits, so that their performance is the most optimal possible.

You can see the visitors go to the attraction and get up and reacting to the trip all with realistic animations.

· Twister ·

Twister is a classic attraction of amusement park and street fairs. It is popularly known as Umbrellas, or flying umbrellas.
It has a shaft driven by a motor, and an arm that lifts the entire structure thanks to a large hydraulic motor.

Features:

- People.
- HD graphics.
- Realistic animations and physics.
- Controls for each part of the attraction.
- Control of lights and effects.
- Day and night.
- High quality sound and effects.
- 8 Cameras to choose from.
- Simple and clear interface.
- Great optimization.
- Graphic Configuration.
